participant_1.name: Ethan Carter
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, Ethan is always looking for new opportunities to excel in his career.
participant_1.background: i plan to go to business school next year. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. my parents are very wealthy bankers.

participant_2.background: i'm a librarian. i am 60years old. i've visited spain a times. i think i'll retire in a few years.
